name: 部署数据库系统
description: 数据库系统是一种用于存储和管理数据的系统，可以帮助用户提高数据的安全性和可靠性

steps.name: 解压部署包
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(ls /app/database/ | grep database.tar.gz)" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi'

steps.name: 下载PG数据库镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep postgres)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 传输PG数据库镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep postgres)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'

steps.name: 加载PG数据库镜像
steps.condition: sh -c 'if [ -z "$(docker images --format "{% raw %}{{.Repository}}{% endraw %}" | grep postgres)" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'
steps.command: for image in $(ls /app/images/*.tar); do docker load -i "${image}"; done
